title: Card Actions
description: Card action details such as card type as well as activation and lock status.

xdm:cardActivated.title: Card Activated Success
xdm:cardActivated.description: Tracks when a card has been successfully activated.

xdm:cardActivationStart.title: Card Activation Started
xdm:cardActivationStart.description: Tracks when a card activation process has been started.

xdm:cardCancelled.title: Card Cancelled
xdm:cardCancelled.description: Tracks when a card has been cancelled.

xdm:cardControlsLocked.title: Card Controls Locked
xdm:cardControlsLocked.description: Tracks when a card controls have been locked.

xdm:cardControlsUnlocked.title: Card Controls Unlocked
xdm:cardControlsUnlocked.description: Tracks when a card controls have been unlocked.

xdm:cardLocked.title: Card Locked
xdm:cardLocked.description: Tracks when a card has been locked.

xdm:cardOrderNew.title: Order New Card
xdm:cardOrderNew.description: Tracks when a card has been requested.

xdm:cardOrderType.title: Card Order Type
xdm:cardOrderType.description: Tracks the type of card order associated with a card order event.

xdm:cardType.title: Card Type
xdm:cardType.description: Tracks the type of card associated with an event.

xdm:cardUnlocked.title: Card Unlocked
xdm:cardUnlocked.description: Tracks when a card has been unlocked.
